description:
Maruyama still hasn`t recovered from the trauma he experienced when Sakamoto was his personal errand boy. As he watches Maruyama tremble in fear at the mere sight of Sakamoto, Hayabusa-senpai, fellow delinquent and head of the second-years, challenges Sakamoto to fight one-on-one!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Softball Throw / The Charismatic Delinquent, Hayabusa-senpai / Personal Health Care
ソフトボール投げ / カリスマヤンキー8823先輩 / 健康管理
